treatmentLine.selectedListName: Inflammatory Bowel Agent - Aminosalicylates and Related Agents
Antipsoriatic Agents - MC Antibody, Human Interleukin 12/23 Inhibitors

dosing.text: Induction: 200mg by subcutaneous injection at week 0, followed by 100 mg by subcutaneous injection at week 2.
Maintenance: 100 mg by subcutaneous injection very 4 weeks.

qlimit.initPerIntervalDesc: 300 mg / 3 syringes for the first 4 weeks, then 100 mg / 1 syringe every 4 weeks
